summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to an amending Plat 32E, Page 94 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone from CG to RM 800 certain property in Block 26, Lake Washington Shorelands; Block 25, Replat of Blocks 24 and 25 of Lake Washington Shorelands; Block 36, Loch-McGilvra Addition to the City of Seattle; and Block E, supplement to J.J. McGilvra's Third Addition to the City of Seattle; located on the east side of 43rd Avenue East and North of East Madison Street. (C.F. 287303, Petition of Madison Park Community Council).
